resources.string: Hello!\nThis app will show you different ways of managing data in android

Assets is a data in apk of your application

Pros: Always packaged with application

Cons: You can't modify it

You can use it for purpose, when you need some data (text files, images, songs) available from the box.

In this example you can display directory and load file from assets.

Internal storage allows you to store data of your application. This data are private by default.

Pros: Always packaged with application

Cons: You can't modify it

In this example you can create file in internal storage and then open it. Additionally, you can create cache file in internal storage. You can try delete cache from phone settings.
External storage is placed on sdcard.

Shared preferences allows you to save key-value pairs of primitive data types.

Pros: 

Cons:

Experience: if you call registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, so you should call unregisterOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener in fragment onStop()
